
### addressing modes with %rip  {.smaller}


* [ AT&amp;T]{.my-small} <code>0x1234(%rip)</code> <br> [ Intel]{.my-small} <code>[RIP + 0x1234]</code>  

   * value in memory 0x1234 bytes after current instruction
 
```
thing: .quad 42
...
movq thing(%rip), %rax

```
 

   * <em>special case in Linux assembler</em>
   * if movq ends at 0x7000 and thing is at 0x5000, then…
   * as <code>movq -0x2000(%rip), %rax</code>  

      * <it>not</it> movq 0x5000…
